document_data.name: Drovers' Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Drovers' Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved road in the city of [[Waterdeep]] that ran through the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] and into the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]].
document_data.Geography:
This road ran from north to south, running south off of the southern half of [[Salabar Street]] (sometimes known as Moorewalk) in the Trades Ward, in a manner roughly parallel to [[Buckle Street]], and passed through [[Sahtyra's Lane]] as it moved into the Southern Ward. Along the way, [[Shoor Street]] ran west off of Drovers' Street.

An unnamed cul-de-sac opened east off the north end of this street.<ref>
